typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date 'yyyy-MM-dd',
		Value as decimal(15,2) '000,000,000.000',
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	dateFormats: ['yyyy-MM-dd']) ~> PaymentsAzDL
source(output(
		CustomerName as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		PaymentDate as string,
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		Value as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'document') ~> PaymentsCosmosDB
PaymentsAzDL sink(input(
		PaymentNr as string,
		SalesOrderNr as string,
		CustomerNr as string,
		CustomerName as string,
		PaymentDate as date,
		PaymentValue as decimal(15,2),
		Currency as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	staged: true,
	allowCopyCommand: true,
	mapColumn(
		PaymentNr,
		SalesOrderNr,
		CustomerNr,
		CustomerName,
		PaymentDate,
		PaymentValue = Value,
		Currency
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SynapePayments
